title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\UpdateJobRequest
name: UpdateJobRequest
description:
A request to update a job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.UpdateJobRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Required. The ID of the Google Cloud Platform project that the job belongs to.

params.name: data.region
params.description: Required. The Dataproc region in which to handle the request.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. Specifies the path, relative to Job, of the field to update. For example, to update the labels of a Job the update_mask parameter would be specified as labels, and the PATCH request body would specify the new value. Note: Currently, labels is the only field that can be updated.
